reviewtext: WHO would put a hole (presumably to equalize pressure?) in the back of a portable GPS?  IPX7 no way.  what did garmin expect would happen if a warm GPS fell into cold water?  very first time it went 4" into water for no more than five seconds it sucked water in and never would turn on again.  a simple internal bladder is all it would take.  this thing is garbage if you need it any where near water.
summary: etrex NOT waterproof, not water resistant
